Package com.medilabosolutions.note_service.service

Class NoteService

java.lang.Object
com.medilabosolutions.note_service.service.NoteService
@Service public class NoteService extends Object
Service for managing patient notes. Handles business logic for note creation, retrieval, and deletion.

      public NoteService()

  • Method Details

    • createNote

      public NoteCreateDTO createNote(NoteCreateDTO noteCreateDTO)
      Creates a new note for a patient. Automatically sets the current date/time for the note.
      Parameters:
      noteCreateDTO - DTO containing note content and patient information
      Returns:
      NoteCreateDTO representing the created note with generated ID and timestamp

    • getAllNotesByPatientId

      public List<NoteDTO> getAllNotesByPatientId(int patientId)
      Retrieves all notes for a specific patient. GET /api/notes/patient/{patientId}
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to retrieve notes for
      Returns:
      List of NoteDTOs containing all notes for the specified patient

    • deleteNoteById

      public void deleteNoteById(String id)
      Deletes a specific note by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the note to delete

    • deleteAllNotes

      public void deleteAllNotes()
      Deletes all notes from the system. Primarily used for testing and cleanup purposes. Use with caution as this operation is irreversible.
